key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks, including ongoing scrutiny and settlements related to PBM practices
Integration challenges from the WellCare Health Plans acquisition
Reputation and member retention risks due to claims processing delays and member complaints
Market and policy uncertainty, including potential Medicaid cuts and ACA subsidy expirations
controversies: Pharmacy Benefit Management (PBM) overcharging allegations leading to significant settlements
Regulatory investigations in multiple states raising compliance and governance concerns
Ethical and operational concerns, including incorrect billing and poor customer service
social_issues: Delays in claims processing and handling member complaints affecting member trust
Criticism for poor customer service and incorrect billing practices
governance_issues: Regulatory investigations and compliance issues noted by the Delaware Chancery Court
Board awareness of regulatory issues without sufficient action to address compliance
